summary: DOD must notify Congress and GAO of any military construction project or military family housing project that costs more than $40 million where DOD has identified a cost increase of 25% or more. In the reports, DOD must include the specific reasons for the increase and identify the organizations and individuals responsible for the increase (among other elements). DOD submitted 5 such reports during fiscal...
title: Military Construction: Cost Increase Reports Submitted in Fiscal Years 2018 and 2019
